alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 4:12PM CDT until June 23 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...From Monday evening to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Several thousand acres of agricultural and lowland become inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 17.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Black River West 15.0 6.0 Sun 3 pm CDT 14.0 17.0 16.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM CDT.
